description: From Ancient Greek [Term?] (“harlot”) + Ancient Greek [Term?] (“to love”).

adjectives.description: pornerastic (comparative more pornerastic, superlative most pornerastic)

examples: We hear nothing of those petit crevivices, those pornerastic habits in high places, those Diamond-necklace scandals, those unmentionable gambols of the Porphyro-geniti, which are too often thrust before our eyes in fiction.
